title: Late at night
creator_credit: Bruton Film Studios, Nettlefold Studios and Michael C. Chorlton
brief_description: A London reporter investigates an organised crime ring. Stars Barry Morse; Noel Dryden; Daphne Day; Paul Demel; John Rae; Frank Atkinson; Dennis Harkin; Clifford Cobbe; Ben Williams; Claire Smith; Bill Holland; and Beryl Trent. Story and screenplay by Henry C. James; song ‘Late at Night’ by Arthur Young; musical direction by Arthur Young.
